short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert between simplified and traditional Chinese characters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visit a page with Chinese characters e.g https://3w.huanqiu.com/a/24d596/3yhkrDv25pJ. Right click at the text and choose the option "简↔繁".
long.zh_CN: 選擇文字，右擊鼠標，來回轉換。
long.zh_TW: Right click at the text to toggle conversion.
